void deb(int A[], int n) {
    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        cout << A[i] << " " ;
    }
    cout << endl;
}

ll dp[15][105];

int main()
{
    ll t;
    cin >> t;
    ll i, j, k, l, n, m;
        for (i = 2; i <= 10; i++) {
            for (k = 1; k <= 50; k++) {
                if (k < i) {
                    dp[i][k] = pow(2, k);
                } else if(i == k) {
                    dp[i][k] = pow(2, k) - 1;
                } else {
                    l = k - 1;
                    j = i;
                    while (j > 0) {
                        j--;
                        dp[i][k] += dp[i][l];
                        l--;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    while(t--) {
        
        /*for(i = 2; i <= 10; i++) {

            }
            cout << endl;
        }*/

    }
